*Mantella jumps in the air and does an air split and dodges the shot* *She
shoots eye lasers at Jackle and Pheniox and then spin kicks at Manterror*
----- Original Message -----
From: <JP3884@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Saturday, June 03, 2000 6:10 PM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


> ::: Hell Beast looks to Megatron ::: Zardus is correct Megatron. We cannot
> allign ourselfs with a Predacon fraction that wants to see all of us dead.
>
> ::: Megatron frowned. Mabey Hell Beast and Zardus didnt want to join the
> Newcomers, but Megatron did. They had a plan, a motive, and minions to get
> the job done. He only wished he had the kind of resources Set and Shuko
had,
> then mabey he could have gotten rid of the Autobots originally. :::
>
> ::: Megatron ::: Well, I belive that my fraction would be-
>
> ::: Marine ::: Your fraction consits of two other bots! Shredder and
> Quickstrike! I dont think we'll need you three at all, traitors.
>
> ::: Megatron ::: I will not stand for this, I can here to help you...and
it
> seems im getting the short end of the stick!
>
> ::: Hell Beast ::: Enough! Megatron, ethier you join us, or surrender your
> command and minions over to us. We will not let you walk out of here a
> possible threat.
>
> ::: Megatron sticks out his hand ::: I will join, yes.
>
> ::: He knew this was only temporary. He would have to contact Shuko or
Set.
> He would see the downfall of the Predacons and Allience, from the inside.
:::
>
> ~~~~~~~~
>
> ::: Jackle and Pheniox combine fire towrds Mantella, hoping to stop
> Quickstrike. :::
>
